lines.speaker: Wife
text: You know, this might be weird to hear, but...

lines.speaker: Wife
text: You might not believe it right now, but you're good. You're a good person.

lines.speaker: Hero
text: How can that be possible? Everything he said was true... I couldn't protect you when it really counted.
And now... even if I fight, even if I WIN... It's nothing but selfishness.

lines.speaker: Wife
text: My dear... you know me, right? And you know that I knew you? Down to your core?

lines.speaker: Wife
text: Do you think that I would blame you for failing to protect me?

lines.speaker: Wife
text: This is a new Overdrive combo. It's called Thorium Rush.
When you activate it, your button-mashing will be twice as effective. Let's give it a try.
